Normal checkbox

```js
class CheckboxExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { checked: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <FormField id="sample-checkbox">
        <Checkbox
          checked={this.state.checked}
          onChange={e => this.setState({ checked: e.target.checked })}
        />
        <label>Checkbox label</label>
      </FormField>
    );
  }
}

<CheckboxExample />;
```

Indeterminate checkbox

```js
class IndeterminateCheckboxExample extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { indeterminate: true, checked: false };
  }

  render() {
    return (
      <React.Fragment>
        <FormField id="sample-indeterminate-checkbox">
          <Checkbox
            indeterminate={this.state.indeterminate}
            checked={this.state.checked}
            onChange={e =>
              this.setState({ indeterminate: false, checked: e.target.checked })
            }
          />
          <label>Checkbox label</label>
        </FormField>

        <p>
          <Button
            onClick={() => {
              this.setState({ indeterminate: true, checked: false });
            }}
          >
            Reset
          </Button>
        </p>
      </React.Fragment>
    );
  }
}

<IndeterminateCheckboxExample />;
```
